sources.title: Sea Raiders (1941) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGERüçïDEAD END KIDS
sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Billy Halop, Huntz Hall, Gabriel Dell, Bernard Punsly, Hal E. Chester
Directors: Ford Beebe, John Rawlins
Dead End Kids take on the dangerous Sea Raiders, a ruthless gang sabotaging Allied shipping during World War II.
 üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:07     CHAPTER 1:  The Raider Strikes
21:07     CHAPTER 2:  Flaming Torture
42:47     CHAPTER 3:  The Tragic Crash
1:03:09  CHAPTER 4:  The Raider Strikes Again
1:24:21  CHAPTER 5:  Flames of Fury
1:43:40  CHAPTER 6:  Blasted from the Air
2:03:44  CHAPTER 7:  Victims of the Storm
2:21:57  CHAPTER 8:  Dragged to Their Doom
2:39:32  CHAPTER 9:  Battling the Sea Beast
2:56:58  CHAPTER 10: Periled by a Panther
3:15:02  CHAPTER 11: Entombed in the Tunnel
3:32:31 CHAPTER 12: Paying the Penalty
3:49:57  Please Subscribe!

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Watch every suspense-filled chapter of this classic 1930s serial packed with action, drama, and high-stakes battles on the high seas. If you're a fan of vintage serials, Golden Age Hollywood, classic crime dramas, or the iconic performances of the Dead End Kids, this marathon is a must-watch!

üîî Subscribe for more classic movie serials, 1930s adventures, and rare vintage films!

üé¨ #SeaRaiders #DeadEndKids #1930sSerial #ClassicMovies #VintageCinema #OldHollywood #CliffhangerSerial #GoldenAgeMovies #SerialMarathon #FilmNoir #ClassicAdventure #SeaRaiders1935 #FordBeebe #JohnRawlins

metadata.Plot: The Sea Raiders, a band of foreign agents, led by Carl Tonjes and Elliott Carlton, blow up a freighter on which Billy Adams and Toby Nelson are stowaways, seeking to avoid Brack Warren, a harbor patrol officer assigned to guard a new type of torpedo boat built by Billy's brother, Tom Adams. Intended targets or not, getting blown up does not set well with Billy and Toby and, together with their gang coupled with the members of the Little Tough Guys, they find the Sea Raiders' island hideout, investigate the seacoast underground arsenal of these saboteurs, get blasted from the air, dragged to their doom, become victims of the storm, entombed in a tunnel and even periled by a panther before they don the uniforms of some captured Sea Raiders and board a yacht that serves as headquarters for the Raiders.
metadata.Actors: Billy Halop, Huntz Hall, Gabriel Dell
